item.title: Manual Update of CoreOS
item.description: Goal To create kubernetes multi nodes environments on Windows, one of the option is to create a cluster using CoreOS since the foot print is quite reduced. Setup of the cluster TBD Update of the cluster I found the following link sudo bash -c 'mkdir -p /etc/systemd/system/docker.service.d/; cat <<EOF > /etc/systemd/system/docker.service.d/50-insecure-registry.conf [Service] Environment="DOCKER_OPTS=--insecure-registry 10.0.0.0/8 --insecure-registry 172.16.0.0/12 --insecure-registry 192.168.0.0/16" EOF ' sudo bash -ec 'uname -a && cat /etc/lsb-release && \ echo GROUP=stable > /etc/coreos/update.
